message.body: Dad says you have not chosen a bridle yet....he's waiting!
So lucky moved to the trainer's today! I don't know what kind of bridle he wants yet, we're gonna figure that out.
Lucky's going to make the decision? Dad says? Should we just get you a gift certificate for bday?
How many tomato plants does dad have? Smartpak gift cert would be great, thank you. Don't wanna buy a bridle the horse doesn't want on its face!
